IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE ORGANIZATION RAISES FUNDS TO SUPPORT THE ACTIVITIES OF AFFILIATED 501(C)(3) ENTITIES TO ENABLE SENIORS SERVED BY MORSELIFE TO LIVE THEIR LIVES WITH QUALITY AND DIGNITY.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE ORGANIZATION'S MISSION IS TO RAISE FUNDS TO SUPPORT THE ACTIVITIES OF AFFILIATED 501(C)(3) ENTITIES.
IRS990.Desc: THE PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO RAISE FUNDS FROM THE PUBLIC AT LARGE FOR THE BENEFIT OF RELATED 501(C)(3) ORGANIZATIONS THAT CARE FOR THE FRAIL ELDERLY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION DOES NOT HAVE A FORMAL PROCEDURE FOR MONITORING THE USE OF GRANT FUNDS.

FRIENDS OF MORSELIFE, INC'S KEY PERSONNEL ARE EMPLOYED BY MORSELIFE HEALTH SYSTEM, INC., A RELATED 501(C)(3) ORGANIZATION. THAT ORGANIZATION USES THE FOLLOWING TO ESTABLISH COMPENSATION FOR FRIENDS OF MORSELIFE, INC'S KEY PERSONNEL: COMPENSATION COMMITTEE; FORM 990 OF OTHER ORGANIZATIONS; WRITTEN EMPLOYMENT CONTRACT; COMPENSATION SURVEY OR STUDY; APPROVAL BY THE BOARD OR COMPENSATION COMMITTEE.

MORSELIFE HEALTH SYSTEM, INC. MAINTAINS TWO NONQUALIFIED EMPLOYEE DEFERRED COMPENSATION PLANS OPEN TO CERTAIN KEY EMPLOYEES UNDER INTERNAL REVENUE CODE 457(B) AND SECTION 457(F) (COLLECTIVELY, THE 457 PLANS). THE 457 PLANS PROVIDE, AMONG OTHER THINGS, FOR VOLUNTARY CONTRIBUTIONS TO BE MADE BY ELIGIBLE PARTICIPANTS. THESE FUNDS REMAIN THE PROPERTY OF MORSELIFE HEALTH SYSTEM, INC. AND SUBSIDIARIES. MORSELIFE HEALTH SYSTEM, INC. AND SUBSIDIARIES HAVE A FIDUCIARY DUTY OF ACCOUNTABILITY FOR THESE FUNDS. KEY EXECUTIVE, KEITH MYERS, PARTICIPATES IN THE DEFERRED COMPENSATION PLAN UNDER IRC SEC. 457(F). JOSEPH L. MORSE HEALTH CENTER, INC. MADE CONTRIBUTIONS ON BEHALF OF KEITH MYERS TO THE PLAN IN THE AMOUNT OF $50,000 FOR THE YEAR ENDED DECEMBER 31, 2017. JOSEPH L. MORSE HEALTH CENTER, INC. MADE CONTRIBUTIONS ON BEHALF OF THE FOLLOWING LISTED EMPLOYEES THAT PARTICIPATED IN THE DEFERRED COMPENSATION PLAN UNDER IRC SEC. 457(B). CHAE, HONG - $8,609. MYERS, KEITH - $4,996. PAPPAS, MARY ALICE - $15,669.

KEITH MYERS, PRESIDENT AND CEO, HAS AN INCENTIVE/BONUS CLAUSE IN HIS EMPLOYMENT AGREEMENT WITH MORSELIFE HEALTH SYSTEM, INC. (A RELATED ORGANIZATION). THE INCENTIVE/BONUS IS BASED ON INDIVIDUAL PERFORMANCE, AS APPROVED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MORSELIFE HEALTH SYSTEM, INC IS THE SOLE MEMBER OF THE FRIENDS OF MORSELIFE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SOLE MEMBER, MORSELIFE HEALTH SYSTEM, INC., SHALL ELECT BOARD MEMBERS AND AT ANY TIME IN ITS SOLE DISCRETION, REMOVE AND NAME A REPLACEMENT FOR ANY BOARD MEMBER.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MORSELIFE HEALTH SYSTEM, INC IS THE SOLE MEMBER OF THE FRIENDS OF MORSELIFE, INC. AND, AS SUCH, ELECTS THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS AND HAS ULTIMATE VOTING AND VETO AUTHORITY OVER BOARD DECISIONS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE COMMITTEE, COMPOSED OF THE CHAIRPERSON OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS FROM EACH OF THE MORSELIFE RELATED ORGANIZATIONS AND THE SENIOR VICE PRESIDENT OF FINANCE, IS RESPONSIBLE FOR THE REVIEW OF THE FORM 990. THE CHAIRPERSON OF MORSELIFE HEALTH SYSTEM, INC. IS THE CHAIRPERSON OF THE COMMITTEE. THIS COMMITTEE MEETS ONE TIME PER YEAR. THE COMMITTEE IS RESPONSIBLE FOR THE DETAILED REVIEW OF ALL FORMS 990 FILED BY THE MORSE RELATED ENTITIES. THE FORM 990 IS MADE AVAILABLE TO THE FULL BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF THE REPORTING ORGANIZATION. THE 990 IS ALSO AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST THROUGHOUT THE YEAR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION REQUIRES ALL BOARD MEMBERS TO SUBMIT A CONFLICT OF INTEREST STATEMENT ON AN ANNUAL BASIS. BOARD MEMBERS WHO DO NOT ADHERE TO THE ORGANIZATION'S CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY WILL BE TEMPORARILY SUSPENDED FROM ANY VOTING BOARD ACTIVITY. THE STATEMENTS, WHEN COMPLETED AND RETURNED, ARE REVIEWED BY THE PRESIDENT TO ENSURE THAT THERE ARE NO INADVERTENT CONFLICTS OF INTEREST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FRIENDS OF MORSELIFE, INC. IS AN ORGANIZATION CONTROLLED BY MORSELIFE HEALTH SYSTEM, INC. MORSELIFE HEALTH SYSTEM, INC.'S COMPENSATION COMMITTEE IS COMPRISED OF THE BOARD MEMBERS. THIS COMMITTEE IS RESPONSIBLE FOR THE SEARCH, SELECTION, CONTRACT NEGOTIATION, PERFORMANCE REVIEWS, BENEFITS, AND ANNUAL SALARY INCREASES OF THE PRESIDENT & CEO POSITION. THE INITIAL CONTRACT NEGOTIATIONS OF THE PRESIDENT & CEO POSITION WERE BASED ON THE COMMITTEE'S REVIEW OF SIMILAR ENTITIES COMPENSATION PACKAGES FOR THE TOP OFFICIAL BASED ON THOSE ENTITIES' PUBLISHED IRS FORM 990. IN ADDITION, THE COMPENSATION COMMITTEE SUBSCRIBES AND PARTICIPATES IN SEVERAL INDEPENDENT SALARY SURVEYS CONDUCTED BY NATIONAL ASSOCIATIONS & OTHER PROVIDER ENTITIES AND UTILIZES THE FINDINGS OF THESE SURVEYS TO ENSURE COMPARABILITY AND APPROPRIATENESS OF THE PRESIDENT/CEO COMPENSATION PACKAGE. THE COMMITTEE MEETS AT LEAST ANNUALLY TO CONDUCT A PERFORMANCE REVIEW OF THE PRESIDENT/CEO. PERFORMANCE IS BASED ON PREVIOUSLY ESTABLISHED METRICS AND BENCHMARKS AND THE ACHIEVEMENT OF THESE GOALS IS THE BASIS FOR FINANCIAL INCENTIVE, BONUS AND ANNUAL SALARY INCREASE. THE COMPENSATION COMMITTEE DOCUMENTS THEIR MEETINGS WITH WRITTEN MINUTES, AS WELL AS MEMOS TO THE SENIOR VICE PRESIDENT OF FINANCE, WITH INSTRUCTIONS REGARDING THE EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION. THE PRESIDENT & CEO OF THE ORGANIZATION IS RESPONSIBLE FOR THE COMPENSATION OF THE MEMBERS OF THE EXECUTIVE TEAM, INCLUDING THE SR. VICE PRESIDENTS AND CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER. ANNUAL INCREASES AND BASE SALARY AMOUNTS ARE COMPARED TO THE COMPENSATION PACKAGES FOR SIMILAR POSITIONS UTILIZING OTHER SIMILAR ENTITIES' PUBLISHED IRS FORM 990. IN ADDITION, INDEPENDENT SALARY SURVEYS CONDUCTED BY NATIONAL ASSOCIATIONS & OTHER PROVIDER ENTITIES ARE UTILIZED TO ENSURE COMPARABILITY AND APPROPRIATENESS. THE PRESIDENT & CEO REPORTS ON THE ANNUAL INCREASE, SALARY ADJUSTMENT, AND/OR CHANGE IN BENEFIT PACKAGE FOR THE EXECUTIVE TEAM MEMBERS TO THE COMPENSATION COMMITTEE MADE UP OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
